name: Let's kill Gobelin !
description:
Your Heroes have rushed to the Goblin City ! You can't control them, but you must assure that they survive this adventure! By chance, you can change the Gobelin Army to ensure that your precious little heroes come back alive !

Plan the gobelin defense to allow the heroes to survive and try to maximise your score by making this expedition a though challenge !

A game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. A game made by one person, Yoann Bouquey.

(Well the game turn out to be disappointing to me, I you like it it's great, but to me it's a failure. It's happen sometimes, hope next year will be better !)

Credits :
Rolemusic - The Black Kitten
timgormly - hurt sound
